T02TD3076AE:172a-0: @172a * // mchod rten dang tsha tsha gdab pa yan chad nas bye ba gdab pa la sogs kun kyang /
T02TD3076AE:172a-1: bsam pa'i rgyud dang sngags ni 'dra ste /
T02TD3076AE:172a-2: dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi cha byad /
T02TD3076AE:172a-3: phyag rgya dang sngags su ldan pas bdun yan chad nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad du chu la bsngags te /
T02TD3076AE:172a-4: 'jim pa dang yo byad yan chad la gdab bo //
T02TD3076AE:172a-5: de la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD3076AE:172a-6: rdo rje bcings pa bsngoms te mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa bsgreng /
T02TD3076AE:172a-7: mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gzhibs te cung zad kyis mi sbyar bar byas la /
T02TD3076AE:172a-8: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las mche ba'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3076AE:172a-11: 'dis btab pas thams cad gtsang mar bsams pa dang /
T02TD3076AE:172a-12: bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3076AE:172a-13: aom shuddhe na du sho dha ya /
T02TD3076AE:172a-15: thams cad gtsang mar bsangs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3076AE:172a-16: de'i 'og tu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ba'i sngags la /
T02TD3076AE:172a-17: na ma stree ya dhvi ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02TD3076AE:172a-20: shu bha na aaksho bhya mri ta panytsa bande aa ham /
T02TD3076AE:172a-24: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02TD3076AE:172a-30: ya sho ya sho ba ti /
T02TD3076AE:172a-31: te dza te dzo ba ti sarba buddh'a shthi te sv'a h'a /
T02TD3076AE:172a-32: mu dra gdab pa'i 'jim pa'am sngags bri ba'i tshe sngags lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la /
T02TD3076AE:172a-33: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02TD3076AE:172a-34: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02TD3076AE:172a-35: aom badzra a'a yushe sv'a h'a /
T02TD3076AE:172a-37: aom badzrod bha ba sv'a h'a /
T02TD3076AE:172a-39: s'atstsha'i skol phor gyi nang du bye mas gdab pa'am /
T02TD3076AE:172b-0: snum gyis bsku ba'i sngags la aom badzra dh'a tu garbhe @172b sv'a h'a /
T02TD3076AE:172b-1: tho bas brdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la /
T02TD3076AE:172b-2: aom badzra mudg'a ra a'a ko ta ya h'um /
T02TD3076AE:172b-3: tsee tya phor bu nas dbyung ba'i sngags la /
T02TD3076AE:172b-5: 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la /
T02TD3076AE:172b-6: aom pra m'arda na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD3076AE:172b-7: tsee tya dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa'i sngags la /
T02TD3076AE:172b-8: aom su phra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD3076AE:172b-9: cho ga de ltar byas na tsee tya gcig btab pas bye ba snyed btab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3076AE:172b-10: skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3076AE:172b-11: dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bskus na nad mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa nad thams cad ma lus pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
